text: Philip Newton, M.D. on April 10, 1916 Philip Newton, M.D. was an American who served with the Russian ambulance corps during World War I and was promoted to a General by Nicholas II. ==Biography== He attended the United States Military Academy at West Point, New York. While in Russia in 1915 he married Helene Shahofskaya. ==References== Category:United States Military Academy alumni Category:20th-century American physicians Category:Imperial Russian Army generals
title: Philip Newton
